text: Fokion (Phokion) Zaimis (1899–1967) was a Greek politician. He served twice as minister of the interior (1949–1950, 1965–1966), minister of finance (March–April 1950, August–September 1950), minister of economy (March 1950, August–September 1950, 1951), minister of housing and reconstruction (1950–1951), minister of health (1950), minister of welfare (1950–1952) and minister of commerce (1947–1948). ==References== *Rulers.org Category:1899 births Category:1967 deaths Category:Ministers of the Interior of Greece
title: Fokion Zaimis
